# Adventure (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Ascendant Ellena |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** The character gains the [[Evasion|evasion]] ability. The ability is identical to the 2nd-level rogue special ability of the same name.

**Adventure Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|Comprehend Languages]]****:** You understand all spoken and written languages.

**2** **[[Heroism (Spell)|Heroism]]****:** Gives +2 on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

**3** **[[Continual Flame (Spell)|Continual Flame]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Makes a permanent, heatless light.

**4** **[[Secure Shelter (Spell)|Secure Shelter]]****:** Creates sturdy cottage.

**5** **[[Break Enchantment (Spell)|Break Enchantment]]****:** Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

**6** **[[Heroes' Feast (Spell)|Heroes' Feast]]****:** Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

**7** **[[Legend Lore (Spell)|Legend Lore]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

**8** **[[Protection From Spells (Spell)|Protection from Spells]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Confers +8 resistance bonus.

**9** **[[Moment of Prescience (Spell)|Moment of Prescience]]****:** You gain +1/level insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

**Source:** Iron Kingdoms Character Guide (Privateer Press), pg. 286
